main.subtitle: Hi! I'm
main.name: Rustem
main.description: Here you can get acquainted with my portfolio, view my projects, learn about me and my technology stack.

about.aboutDescription: My name is Rustem. I am from the Republic of Tatarstan - Russia, the city of Kazan. He started his career in IT as a freelance web designer, worked for about a year, got acquainted with the layout, liked it. He began to deepen, continued to work freelance, creating a layout and making it himself, then completely switched to fronted, began to cooperate with several companies. There I was engaged in layout and developed projects on react, such as online stores, blogs, multi-pages, landing pages and many other interesting projects, at the moment I continue to improve, study new technologies, consolidate old ones.
about.softSkills: Organization and planning of working hours, analytical thinking, the desire to learn and develop, communication skills, ability to work in a team, stress tolerance

notFound.descr: The page was not found, but there are more interesting pages
